Course Section: CHEM_V 411-202 - Synthesis and Chemistry of Natural Products
CHEM_V 412-266 - Electronic Structure of Atoms and Molecules
CHEM_V 416-212 - Physical and Theoretical Organic Chemistry

Course Section Definition Public Notes: No direct student registration to RLE sections of CHEM445. A list of available RLE projects will be circulated via email in August and a matching process carried out in early September; you may alternately organize a placement directly with a faculty supervisor before then.

For students in CHEM and combined CHEM+other science subject programs. You must have a faculty supervisor arranged before requesting CHEM448 registration via ost.chem.ubc.ca (option 6 'Contact Advisor').
Register for both IND and RSH sections.

For students in CHEM and combined CHEM+other science subject programs. You must have a faculty supervisor arranged before requesting CHEM448 registration via ost.chem.ubc.ca (option 6 'Contact Advisor').
Register for both IND and RSH sections.

Register for both the RSH (research) and THS (thesis) sections.

Course Section: CHIN_V 403-021 - Advanced Chinese Reading and Writing II (Non-Heritage)
Course Section Definition Public Notes:
Placement Procedure -Prior to registration in any CHIN-titled courses, students are required to complete the Placement Procedure every Winter session or Summer Session and obtain a placement approval certificate for the courses they wish to register for. Students are only eligible for courses listed on their placement approval certificate. Students enrolled in sections which they do not have placement approval for will be removed from the course.

Delivery Mode -This course has 3 instructional hrs/wk in person, 1.5 hours on Tuesday and 1.5 hrs on Thursday, both conducted synchronously. For further information regarding CHIN courses, please go to https://chinese.arts.ubc.ca/courses/ .

Waitlist Policy -All waitlists will follow a first come, first serve policy, unless specified otherwise. Once a course is full, its status will be changed to “Waitlist” and students who register will be automatically added to the waitlist.

Course Section: CINE_V 432-A_001 - Seminar in Motion Picture Forms (A)
Course Section Definition Public Notes: If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

A course that mixes murder and laughter; 'Murder by Death' and 'A Simple Favor' (and Buster Keaton) will feature.

If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the department.
